sentences.en: Advanced imported photoelectric supervision system is used.
sentences.cn: 采用先进的进口光电眼监控系统。

sentences.en: Early results on the photoelectric effect had not produced consistent results.
sentences.cn: 有关光电效应的早期实验,并未取得协调一致的结果.

sentences.en: Photoelectric celled can be installed for pitch control according to requirement.
sentences.cn: 可按照要求加装光电管实行节距控制.

sentences.en: Photoelectric control system stops machine when the bottle is blocking or lacking.
sentences.cn: 缺瓶、堵瓶采用国际品牌光电控制并自动停止运行.

sentences.en: Photoelectric sensor and double - screw feeder can control the feeding forcibly and equally.
sentences.cn: 双螺杆强制喂料及光电眼喂料跟踪、喂料均匀.
用光电分光光度计能得到较佳结果.

sentences.en: Photoelectric work offers the widest scope.
sentences.cn: 光电工作提供了最广阔的天地.

sentences.en: Pulse is photoelectric isolation static idle contact form output.
sentences.cn: 脉冲是光电隔离的静态空接点形式输出.

sentences.en: The common troubleshooting of the photoelectric analytical balance was introduced.
sentences.cn: 介绍光电分析天平一般故障的现象、产生的原因及其排除方法.

sentences.en: The electrical connection in the photoelectric s levator involves electronics.
sentences.cn: 光电升降机嗉的电气连接涉及到电子学.

sentences.en: The electronic lock on faucet and bathroom door connects by photoelectric cell.
sentences.cn: 水龙头与厕所门上的电子锁由光电管连通.

sentences.en: The photoelectric transition property of Silicon photo - voltaic Cell was examined theoreticallyand experimentally.
sentences.cn: 从理论和实验上探讨了硅光电池的光电转换性能.

sentences.en: The receiver includes the choice of photoelectric detector and receiving circuit.
sentences.cn: 接收部分针对光电探测器和接收电路的选择展开论述.

sentences.en: This is obviously due to the Compton and photoelectric effects.
sentences.cn: 很明显,这是由于康普顿效应与光电效应作用的缘故.

sentences.en: This paper introduces a kind of photoelectric hybridization measuring process.
sentences.cn: 本文介绍了一种光电混合测定方法.

sentences.en: Tho nbsp ; electrical connection in the photoelectric elevator involves ee ectronics.
